Pre-Game Insights: India and Bangladesh have won two out of three matches in the T20 World Cup
Both teams have been in good form with Virat Kohli and Suryakumar Yadav standing out for India
Others: The match is set to take place at 1:30 PM IST

The game will be played at the Adelaide Oval in Adelaide
